titleStmt.title: The lawfulnes of the late passages of the Army (especially of the grounds laid downe for their justification in their late declarations of June 14. 1647.) / Examined by one who hath long beene a friend to the Army, and desires satisfaction.
titleStmt.author: One who hath long beene a friend to the Army.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
